problems.title: Letter Case Permutation (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a string s, you can transform every letter individually to be lowercase or uppercase to create another string.
Return a list of all possible strings we could create. Return the output in any order.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
a1b2

Sample Output
a1b2
a1B2
A1b2
A1B2

Explanation: All possible combinations of case for letters.

Sample Input
3z4

Sample Output
3z4
3Z4

Explanation: Only the letter 'z' can be transformed.
problems.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 12
s consists of lowercase English letters, uppercase English letters, and digits.

testCases.expectedOutput:
aBc1
aBC1
abC1
abc1
Abc1
AbC1
ABC1
ABc1

ABC123
ABc123
Abc123
AbC123
abC123
abc123
aBc123
aBC123

hintsList: Use backtracking or bit manipulation to generate all combinations.
For each letter position, try both lowercase and uppercase versions.
